openstack_db_configuration_v1.description: Manages a V1 DB configuration resource within OpenStack.

region.description: The region in which to create the db instance. Changing this

name.description: Configuration parameter name. Changing this creates a new resource.

datastore.description: An array of database engine type and version. The datastore

configuration.description: An array of configuration parameter name and value. Can be specified multiple times. The configuration object structure is documented below.

type.description: Database engine type to be used with this configuration. Changing this creates a new resource.

version.description: Version of database engine type to be used with this configuration. Changing this creates a new resource.

value.description: Configuration parameter value. Changing this creates a new resource.
